gift: Ah, {name}, with {count} diamonds, you strengthen my power!
{name}, your offering will not be forgotten.
{name}, such generosity! You shall be spared... this time.
The diamonds flow, {name}, and so does my power!
{name}, your diamonds bring me closer to victory!
Another gift from {name}! The power grows!
comment: Speak again, {name}, and you shall regret it!
{name}, your words amuse me, but they won't save you.
Do you really think you can intimidate me, {name}?
{name}, your courage is commendable, yet foolish.
{name}, such insolence will be your downfall!
{name}, I will not be swayed by your words!
subscription: {name}, loyalty shall not be forgotten... or will it?
{name}, your loyalty fuels my dark ambitions!
{name}, the alliance grows stronger with you!
{name}, welcome to the ranks of the victorious!
